languages.text: All Executioner’s melee attack apply Bleed on enemies hit due to their first keystone, {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Scourging Strikes{/g}. It allows them to consistently apply damage over time effects on the targets.. Executioner’s second keystone, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g}, immediately deals damage over time effect damage if Executioner applies another one of the same type. Additionally, all subsequent damage of that damage over type effect type is increased until the end of combat. The third part of Executioner’s keystone, {g|f:5c06542194b74ecc922b92f3543703d2}Where It Hurts{/g} makes so that the next Executioner’s next attack makes the target suffer several instances of all damage over time effects, while removing them from the target. Executioner’s heroic act, {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnival of Misery{/g} immediately applies Burning, Toxin and Bleeding on all enemies in combat, while significantly increasing their effectiveness: now all the enemies are on a death timer, ripe for the picking. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammeIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills} Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium) {/g}. Fighter, Reaper or Operative can become an Executioner.

traits.locale_text: All Executioner’s melee attack apply Bleed on enemies hit due to their first keystone, {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Scourging Strikes{/g}. It allows them to consistently apply damage over time effects on the targets.. Executioner’s second keystone, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g}, immediately deals damage over time effect damage if Executioner applies another one of the same type. Additionally, all subsequent damage of that damage over type effect type is increased until the end of combat. The third part of Executioner’s keystone, {g|f:5c06542194b74ecc922b92f3543703d2}Where It Hurts{/g} makes so that the next Executioner’s next attack makes the target suffer several instances of all damage over time effects, while removing them from the target. Executioner’s heroic act, {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnival of Misery{/g} immediately applies Burning, Toxin and Bleeding on all enemies in combat, while significantly increasing their effectiveness: now all the enemies are on a death timer, ripe for the picking. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammeIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills} Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium) {/g}. Fighter, Reaper or Operative can become an Executioner.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancers{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operatives{/g} can become Executioners, masters of damage-over-time effects. The first keystone ability, {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Scourging Strikes{/g}, allows the Executioner to inflict bleeding on any targets hit with melee attacks, making it so that their enemies are constantly suffering from damage-over-time effects. The second keystone ability is called {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g}. Whenever the Executioner inflicts a damage-over-time effect on a target which is already suffering from an effect of the same type, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} makes the target immediately suffer an additional instance of damage from the initial effect. Additionally, all subsequent damage-over-time effects of this type on that target have their level increased until the end of combat. When the Executioner uses their third keystone ability called {g|f:5c06542194b74ecc922b92f3543703d2}Where It Hurts{/g}, their next attack makes the target immediately suffer several instances of the damage-over-time effects inflicted on it previously. After that, these effects are removed. The Executioner's heroic act immediately inflicts bleeding, burning, and toxin on all enemies in combat while also significantly increasing the level of these effects. Now, time is on your side, and your enemies ripe for the picking. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}.

traits.locale_text: Warriors, Bladedancers, and Operatives can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioners{/g}, masters of damage-over-time effects of all sorts. The first keystone ability, {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Scourging Strikes{/g}, allows the Executioner to inflict bleeding on all targets hit with melee attacks. Thus, the Executioner's enemies are constantly suffering damage-over-time effects. The second keystone ability is called {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g}. Whenever the Executioner inflicts a damage-over-time effect on a target which is already suffering from an effect of the same type, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} makes the target immediately suffer an additional instance of damage from the initial effect. Additionally, all subsequent damage-over-time effects of this type on that target have their level increased until the end of combat. When the Executioner uses their third keystone ability called {g|f:5c06542194b74ecc922b92f3543703d2}Where It Hurts{/g}, their next attack makes the target immediately suffer several instances of the damage-over-time effects inflicted on it previously. After that, these effects are removed. The Executioner's heroic act immediately inflicts bleeding, burning, and toxin on all enemies in combat, while significantly increasing the level of these effects. Now, time is on your side, and the enemies are ripe for the picking. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammeIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}.

languages.text: Палачами, подлинными мастерами различных эффектов периодического урона, могут стать {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воины{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцоры смерти{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативники{/g}. Первая ключевая способность {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Секущие удары{/g} позволяет палачу накладывать кровотечение на все цели, получившие от него попадание в ближнем бою. Таким образом, враги палача постоянно страдают от эффектов периодического урона. Вторая ключевая способность называется {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Принудительное покаяние{/g}. Когда палач накладывает эффект периодического урона на цель, на которую уже действует эффект того же типа, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Принудительное покаяние{/g} заставляет цель немедленно получить дополнительный урон от действующего на нее эффекта. Кроме того, до конца боя будет увеличен уровень всех эффектов периодического урона того же типа, которые будут наложены на цель позже. Когда палач применяет третью ключевую способность {g|f:5c06542194b74ecc922b92f3543703d2}По больному{/g}, его следующая атака заставляет цель мгновенно получить увеличенный в несколько раз урон от действующих на нее эффектов периодического урона. После этого эффекты снимаются. Героический акт палача немедленно накладывает горение, кровотечение и отравление на всех противников в бою, при этом уровень этих эффектов существенно повышается. Теперь время работает на вас, а враги станут легкой добычей. Важные {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} палача: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллект{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Навыки{/g} палача: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Знания: Ксеносы{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Знания (Империум){/g}.

languages.text: Les guerriers, les danselames et les agents peuvent devenir des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteurs{/g}, véritables spécialistes des dégâts progressifs. La première capacité clé, {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Flagellation{/g}, permet à l'exécuteur d'infliger un Saignement à toute cible touchée par une attaque de mêlée. Il n'est donc pas rare que leurs ennemis souffrent de dégâts progressifs jusqu'à la fin du combat. La deuxième capacité clé est appelée {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Repentir forcé{/g}. Chaque fois que l'exécuteur inflige un effet de dégâts progressifs à une cible qui souffre déjà d'un effet de ce type, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Repentir forcé{/g} inflige immédiatement à la victime une instance de dégâts supplémentaire de l'effet initial. En outre, tous les prochains effets de dégâts progressifs de ce type sur la cible voient leurs niveaux augmentés jusqu'à la fin du combat. Lorsqu'un exécuteur utilise sa troisième capacité clé, {g|f:5c06542194b74ecc922b92f3543703d2}Souffrance localisée{/g}, sa prochaine attaque amène la cible à subir immédiatement plusieurs instances des effets de dégâts progressifs qui lui ont déjà été infligés, à la suite de quoi lesdits effets sont supprimés. L'acte héroïque de l'exécuteur inflige immédiatement Saignement, Combustion et Toxine à tous les ennemis en combat, tout en augmentant considérablement les niveaux de ces effets. Le temps joue alors en sa faveur, il ne lui reste plus qu'à achever ses adversaires à sa guise. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Connaissance (Xénos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Connaissance (Imperium){/g}.

The Executioner's heroic act immediately inflicts bleeding, burning, and toxin on all enemies in combat while also significantly increasing the level of these effects. Now, time is on your side, and your enemies ripe for the picking. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les guerriers, les danselames et les agents peuvent devenir des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteurs{/g}, des spécialistes des dégâts progressifs. La première capacité clé, {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Flagellation{/g}, permet à l'exécuteur d'infliger un Saignement à toute cible touchée par une attaque de mêlée. Il n'est donc pas rare que leurs ennemis souffrent de dégâts progressifs jusqu'à la fin du combat. La deuxième capacité clé est appelée {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Repentir forcé{/g}. Chaque fois que l'exécuteur inflige un effet de dégâts progressifs à une cible qui souffre déjà d'un effet de ce type, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Repentir forcé{/g} inflige immédiatement à la victime une instance de dégâts supplémentaire de l'effet initial. En outre, tous les prochains effets de dégâts progressifs de ce type sur la cible voient leurs niveaux augmentés jusqu'à la fin du combat. Lorsqu'un exécuteur utilise sa troisième capacité clé, {g|f:5c06542194b74ecc922b92f3543703d2}Souffrance localisée{/g}, sa prochaine attaque amène la cible à subir immédiatement plusieurs instances des effets de dégâts progressifs qui lui ont déjà été infligés, à la suite de quoi lesdits effets sont supprimés. L'acte héroïque de l'exécuteur inflige immédiatement Saignement, Combustion et Toxine à tous les ennemis en combat, tout en augmentant considérablement les niveaux de ces effets. Le temps joue alors en sa faveur, il ne lui reste plus qu'à achever ses adversaires à sa guise. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Connaissance (Xénos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Connaissance (Imperium){/g}.

Chaque fois que l'exécuteur inflige un effet de dégâts progressifs à une cible qui souffre déjà d'un effet de ce type, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Repentir forcé{/g} inflige immédiatement à la victime une instance de dégâts supplémentaire de l'effet initial. En outre, tous les prochains effets de dégâts progressifs de ce type sur la cible voient leurs niveaux augmentés jusqu'à la fin du combat. Lorsqu'un exécuteur utilise sa troisième capacité clé, {g|f:5c06542194b74ecc922b92f3543703d2}Souffrance localisée{/g}, sa prochaine attaque amène la cible à subir immédiatement plusieurs instances des effets de dégâts progressifs qui lui ont déjà été infligés, à la suite de quoi lesdits effets sont supprimés. L'acte héroïque de l'exécuteur inflige immédiatement Saignement, Combustion et Toxine à tous les ennemis en combat, tout en augmentant considérablement les niveaux de ces effets. Le temps joue alors en sa faveur, il ne lui reste plus qu'à achever ses adversaires à sa guise. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Connaissance (Xénos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Connaissance (Imperium){/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agenten{/g} können Henker mit Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekten werden. Mit der ersten Grundstein-Fähigkeit, {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Peitschende Hiebe {/g}, kann der Henker beliebige Ziele mit Nahkampfangriffen mit "Blutung" belegen, wodurch seine Gegner kontinuierlich unter Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekten leiden. Die zweite Grundstein-Fähigkeit heißt {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Erzwungene Reue{/g}. Belegt der Henker ein Ziel, das bereits mit einem Effekt desselben Typs belegt ist, mit einem Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekt, erleidet das Ziel durch {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Erzwungene Reue{/g} sofort eine weitere Schadensinstanz des ursprünglichen Effektes. Außerdem erhöht sich die Stufe aller folgenden Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte dieses Typs auf das Ziel bis zum Ende des Kampfes. Setzt der Henker seine dritte Grundstein-Fähigkeit, {g|f:5c06542194b74ecc922b92f3543703d2}Wo es wehtut{/g}, ein, belegt sein nächster Angriff das Ziel sofort mit mehreren Instanzen des zuvor bewirkten Schaden-über-Zeit-Effektes. Anschließend werden diese Effekte entfernt. Die Heldentat des Henkers belegt sofort alle am Kampf beteiligten Gegner mit "Blutung", "Verbrennen" und "Gift" und erhöht die Stufe dieser Effekte beträchtlich. Damit ist die Zeit auf deiner Seite und die letzte Stunde deiner Gegner hat geschlagen. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit {/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fähigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Wissen (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Wissen (Imperium){/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancers{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operatives{/g} can become Executioners, masters of damage-over-time effects. The first keystone ability, {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Scourging Strikes{/g}, allows the Executioner to inflict bleeding on any targets hit with melee attacks, making it so that their enemies are constantly suffering from damage-over-time effects. The second keystone ability is called {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g}. Whenever the Executioner inflicts a damage-over-time effect on a target which is already suffering from an effect of the same type, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} makes the target immediately suffer an additional instance of damage from the initial effect. Additionally, all subsequent damage-over-time effects of this type on that target have their level increased until the end of combat. When the Executioner uses their third keystone ability called {g|f:5c06542194b74ecc922b92f3543703d2}Where It Hurts{/g}, their next attack makes the target immediately suffer several instances of the damage-over-time effects inflicted on it previously. After that, these effects are removed. The Executioner's heroic act immediately inflicts bleeding, burning, and toxin on all enemies in combat while also significantly increasing the level of these effects. Now, time is on your side, and your enemies ripe for the picking. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}.

languages.text: Los {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerreros{/g}, los {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hojas danzantes{/g} y los {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agentes{/g} pueden convertirse en ejecutores, maestros de los efectos de daño continuado. La primera capacidad clave, {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Golpes flagelantes{/g}, permite al ejecutor infligir daño de hemorragia a todos los enemigos golpeados con ataques cuerpo a cuerpo. De esta manera, los enemigos sufrirán efectos de daño continuado de manera constante. La segunda capacidad clave se llama {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Arrepentimiento forzoso{/g}. Cada vez que el ejecutor inflige un efecto de daño continuado a un objetivo que ya sufre un efecto del mismo tipo, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Arrepentimiento forzoso{/g} hace que el objetivo reciba de inmediato una aplicación adicional del daño del efecto inicial. Además, todos los efectos de daño continuado posteriores de este tipo al objetivo tendrán un nivel adicional hasta el final del combate. Cuando el ejecutor utiliza su tercera capacidad clave, {g|f:5c06542194b74ecc922b92f3543703d2}Donde duele{/g}, su siguiente ataque causa que el objetivo reciba de inmediato varias aplicaciones de los efectos de daño continuado que sufra. Después de que ocurra esto, se eliminan estos efectos. El acto heroico del ejecutor inflige de inmediato hemorragia, quemadura y toxina a todos los enemigos en combate al mismo tiempo que aumenta significativamente el nivel de estos efectos. El tiempo está a tu favor, hora de cosechar a tus enemigos. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características{/g} clave: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletismo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Conocimiento (xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Conocimiento (Imperium){/g}.

languages.text: 戦士、ブレードダンサー、オペレーターは、継続ダメージ効果の達人である{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}になることができる。 最初の重要なアビリティ{g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}痛打{/g}は、エクスキューショナーが近接攻撃で命中した対象すべてに出血を与え、敵が常に継続ダメージ効果に苦しむようにする。 二つ目の重要なアビリティは{g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}リペンタンスの強制{/g}だ。エクスキューショナーが既に同じタイプの効果で苦しんでいる敵に継続ダメージ効果を与えると、{g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}リペンタンスの強制{/g}は最初の効果による追加ダメージを対象に即座に与える。さらに、その対象に対するそれ以降のこのタイプの継続ダメージ効果はすべて、戦闘終了時までそのレベルが増加する。 エクスキューショナーが3つ目の重要なアビリティである{g|f:5c06542194b74ecc922b92f3543703d2}急所突き{/g}を使用すると、 次の攻撃で対象は即座に以前に受けた継続ダメージ効果によって複数回苦しめられる。その後、それらの効果は取り除かれる。 エクスキューショナーの英雄的行為は、戦闘中のすべての敵に出血、炎上、毒素を即座に与え、同時にこれらの効果のレベルを大幅に上昇させる。さあ、これで機は熟した。敵を刈り取るのだ。 重要な{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}身体能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}伝承（異種族）{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}伝承（帝国）{/g}。
languages.original_text: Warriors, Bladedancers, and Operatives can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioners{/g}, masters of damage-over-time effects. The first keystone ability, {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Scourging Strikes{/g}, allows the Executioner to inflict bleeding on any targets hit with melee attacks, making it so that their enemies are constantly suffering from damage-over-time effects. The second keystone ability is called {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g}. Whenever the Executioner inflicts a damage-over-time effect on a target which is already suffering from an effect of the same type, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} makes the target immediately suffer an additional instance of damage from the initial effect. Additionally, all subsequent damage-over-time effects of this type on that target have their level increased until the end of combat. When the Executioner uses their third keystone ability called {g|f:5c06542194b74ecc922b92f3543703d2}Where It Hurts{/g}, their next attack makes the target immediately suffer several instances of the damage-over-time effects inflicted on it previously. After that, these effects are removed. The Executioner's heroic act immediately inflicts bleeding, burning, and toxin on all enemies in combat while also significantly increasing the level of these effects. Now, time is on your side, and your enemies ripe for the picking. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}.

戦士、ブレードダンサー、オペレーターは、継続ダメージ効果の達人である{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}になることができる。 最初の重要なアビリティ{g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}痛打{/g}は、エクスキューショナーが近接攻撃で命中した対象すべてに出血を与え、敵が常に継続ダメージ効果に苦しむようにする。 二つ目の重要なアビリティは{g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}リペンタンスの強制{/g}だ。エクスキューショナーが既に同じタイプの効果で苦しんでいる敵に継続ダメージ効果を与えると、{g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}リペンタンスの強制{/g}は最初の効果による追加ダメージを対象に即座に与える。さらに、その対象に対するそれ以降のこのタイプの継続ダメージ効果はすべて、戦闘終了時までそのレベルが増加する。 エクスキューショナーが3つ目の重要なアビリティである{g|f:5c06542194b74ecc922b92f3543703d2}急所突き{/g}を使用すると、 次の攻撃で対象は即座に以前に受けた継続ダメージ効果によって複数回苦しめられる。その後、それらの効果は取り除かれる。 エクスキューショナーの英雄的行為は、戦闘中のすべての敵に出血、炎上、毒素を即座に与え、同時にこれらの効果のレベルを大幅に上昇させる。さあ、これで機は熟した。敵を刈り取るのだ。 重要な{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}身体能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}伝承（異種族）{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}伝承（帝国）{/g}。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}可以转职为行刑者，行刑者最擅长造成持续伤害。 行刑者的第一个关键能力为{g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}灾祸打击{/g}。行刑者使用近战攻击命中目标时，会对目标造成流血效果，使其在战斗中受到持续伤害。 行刑者的第二个关键能力为{g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}强迫悔改{/g}。当行刑者对目标施加持续伤害效果时，如果该目标已经受到了同种类型的持续伤害效果影响，{g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}强迫悔改{/g}会立刻对目标造成原本持续伤害效果的伤害。除此之外，后续对该目标继续施加同种类型的持续伤害效果时，该效果的强度等级会提高，效果持续至战斗结束。 行刑者的第三个关键能力为{g|f:5c06542194b74ecc922b92f3543703d2}攻击痛处{/g}。当行刑者使用此能力进行攻击时，此次攻击会触发目标身上所有持续伤害效果，造成多倍伤害，之后移除所有持续伤害效果。 行刑者的英雄壮举会立刻对战斗中所有敌人造成流血、燃烧、毒素效果，同时显著提高上述所有效果的强度等级。这样一来，时间便会成为您的盟友，而您的敌人则会任您宰割。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}知识（异形）{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}知识（帝国）{/g}。

Additionally, all subsequent damage-over-time effects of this type on that target have their level increased until the end of combat. When the Executioner uses their third keystone ability called {g|f:5c06542194b74ecc922b92f3543703d2}Where It Hurts{/g}, their next attack makes the target immediately suffer several instances of the damage-over-time effects inflicted on it previously. The Executioner's heroic act immediately inflicts bleeding, burning, and toxin on all enemies in combat while also significantly increasing the level of these effects. Now, time is on your side, and your enemies ripe for the picking.
